DOC.brief_summary: This study assess impact national , community-based after-school program promote physical activity ( America SCORES ) obesity , fitness important cardiovascular risk factor among minority child . The investigator central hypothesis establish community-based program , America SCORES , reduce obesity cardiovascular risk among participant . The 1-year study follow 158 child 6 public school , 3 randomize SCORES 3 `` usual care '' after-school program . Primary outcome change body mass index ( BMI ) , physical activity ( measure accelerometer ) , fitness ( aerobic capacity assess 20-meter shuttle test ) . Cardiovascular outcome include blood pressure , body composition ( assess use bioelectrical impedance ) waist circumference . The investigator also measure academic outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Reducing Pediatric Obesity Through After-school Programs
DOC.detailed_description: Baseline measure collect September 2009 ; midpoint measure collect January 2010 ; final measure collect May 2010 . Repeated measure analysis compare trajectory BMI , physical activity , fitness student SCORES usual care arm .
